channel.title: Really need help!
channel.description:
[b]so...im running my server its comeup in the CMD and stuff but it says this... command handle class by sam server loaded java.lang.classnotfoundExeption: com.mysql.jdbc.driver at java.net URLClassloader$1.run<unknownsource> at java.security.accessController.doPrivileged<native Method>[/b]
cut to the chase says all that then it says this: [b]shop handler class by sam server successfully loaded started website on hosting IP:500 started players onlin on hosting ip:5000 error: unable to startup istener on 43594 -port already in use?[/b]
thats what it says
but how do i change the ip that its hosting on to my no-ip IP??
AND what do i have to be running to run the server e.g hachami the no-ip website the no-ip duc :S:S HELP!!! :)
~~lewis~~
EDITED....
and ive portforwarded yesterday ill post a screenshot ina min and then tell me if it looks ok... i really wont my own server all help is needed!!!
[img]http://C:\Users\lewis\Pictures\.....jpg[/img]
post if u cannot see it ^^^[br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 05:15:07 AM[/size][hr]Any one please please
i really need the help! :(

item.title: Really need help!
item.dc:creator: @lewis23 lewis23
item.description:
@lewis23 wrote:

so…im running my server its comeup in the CMD and stuff but it says this…
command handle class by sam server loaded
java.lang.classnotfoundExeption: com.mysql.jdbc.driver
at java.net URLClassloader$1.run
at java.security.accessController.doPrivileged

cut to the chase says all that then it says this:
shop handler class by sam server successfully loaded
started website on hosting IP:500
started players onlin on hosting ip:5000
error: unable to startup istener on 43594 -port already in use?

thats what it says

but how do i change the ip that its hosting on to my no-ip IP??

AND
what do i have to be running to run the server e.g hachami the no-ip website the no-ip duc :S:S HELP!!!

lewis

EDITED…

and ive portforwarded yesterday ill post a screenshot ina min and then tell me if it looks ok…
i really wont my own server all help is needed!!!

post if u cannot see it ^^^[br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2007, 05:15:07 AM[/size][hr]Any one please please

i really need the help!
